definitions: Suspends or is suspended from above with the lower part free.
Attaches or is attached to something by its upper part.
Kills (someone) by tying a rope from above around the neck and suddenly removing the support from beneath, so that the body drops and the neck breaks.
Decorates a wall with pictures or wallpaper.
examples: A strange silence hangs over the room.
He hangs his coat on the hook.
The fate of the company hangs in the balance.
The jury hangs on that decision.
She hangs the laundry out to dry.
